attributes.action: Ignore the EU referendum results and do NOT invoke article 50
attributes.additional_details: As the results were found to be so close with only around a 70% turn out... plus many of the Brexit campaigners recalling thier promises hours after the results. spouting lies and hatered. like spending the money saved on the nhs  Mr Farage... the pound and the economy nose diving .. The repercussions of Brexit have been felt across the UK.. Scotland is contemplating leaving.. David Camerons resignation. many people who voted leave regreting thier decision ... call on the government to ignore the EU referendum results and not invoke article 50.. they have the final say
attributes.background: The EU referendum is merely provisional and is not legally binding on parliament to leave the EU
